title: Preferences: Asking (Usefulness 8)
description: Traveler usefulness 8/10 phrases for the Asking subcategory within Preferences. Includes 2 card(s).

cards.english: Do you have any food preferences?
cards.japanese: 好き嫌いはありますか？

cards.english: Do you like or dislike anything in particular?
